#include<stdio.h>
#include<iostream>
#include<bits/stdc++.h>
#define ll long long

using namespace std;

ll D[10];
ll A[34000][1107];
ll n,d,k,l=0;

ll calling(ll idx,ll mask,ll rem)
{if(idx==l)
  {if(rem==k)
    return 1;
     else
      return 0;
  }

 if(A[mask][rem]!=-1)
  return A[mask][rem];

 ll V[10],o=0;
  for(ll i=0;i<10;i++)
   V[i]=-1;
 
 for(ll i=0;i<l;i++)
  {if((mask & (1<<i))==0)
    {if(V[D[i]]==-1)
      {o=o+calling(idx+1,mask|(1<<i),(rem*10+D[i])%d); V[D[i]]=1;}
    }
  }
   A[mask][rem]=o;
    
    return o;
}


int main()
{ 
    memset(A, -1LL, sizeof(A));
    
  cin>>n>>d>>k;
  
  for(ll i=0;i<10;i++)
   D[i]=0;
   
   while(n>0)
    {D[l]=n%10;
     n=n/10;
     l++;
    }
    
    cout<<calling(0,0,0);
     return 0;
}
